price: 27. Sinaamey ginoh gibduk raqtam siini innaa? hinnak qaranaay?xisoh kaa xisek.
arabic: ءَأَنتُمۡ أَشَدُّ خَلۡقًا أَمِ ٱلسَّمَآءُۚ بَنَىٰهَا

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: a-antum ashaddu khalqan ami al-samāu banāhā
